entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
